p.dialogue: Hey, honey... look, it's you!$h
Are you entering the fishing contest this year, @? My mom's pretty serious about winning.
Brr... my hands are freezing from making this snowman.$l
Don't worry about me, I never get cold...
Aren't you cold? Are you sure you don't want my jacket?
I'll be rooting for you in the fishing competition.
I'm dreaming of our warm fire back home...$l
I know you'll beat me in the fishing competition, but I don't mind. I'm just here for the fun of it.$h
What do you think of my snow-goon?
I'm sorry, but carving ice parapets requires my undivided attention!
You know what? I probably should've worn a jacket.
I'm not very creative when it comes to snowmen.$s
Cold? Nah, I never get cold.
This snow is so cold I can't feel my fingers anymore...$s
If it was up to me, I'd probably have a pizza festival at the saloon, instead...
How's winter coming along for you, @?$h

Igloo-building's an art I picked up from the tundra dwellers who live beyond the frozen sea.#$e#That was many years ago.$h#$e#An Igloo makes a nice home, but it's easier to just stay in my tent year-round.
Snowmen are okay, I guess. But mostly I'm looking forward to the spring.
Hmmph... Wife dragged me out into the cold for this?
Did I ever tell you how George and I first met? He actually pelted me with a snowball in this very festival.#$e#He was a gentleman back then, and came over to see if I was okay.$h

Welcome to the Festival of Ice!#$e#The highlight of today's festival is the ice fishing competition. We set up this 'frozen lake' and stocked it full of fish.#$b#Just let me know when you're ready to compete.
Emily started helping me without any provocation... does that mean something? *gulp*$4
Wow, this snowman needs a makeover. Who made this?$s

$y 'Hmm... What kind of snowman should we make?_A classic one. Carrot nose, top-hat, scarf._I guess maybe it's best to stick with the classics, huh?$h_Something funky. Icicle antennas, pine cone eyes._Okay! That sounds like fun.$h_Snowmen are boring. Think outside of the box!_Um, okay... I think I might stick with something more conventional.'
I plan on winning the ice fishing competition!#$e#Willy is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... He does this kinda stuff day and night.$s
I guess Winter isn't all bad... playing in the snow can be fun!
The forest looks beautiful in the winter, doesn't it?
I like winter. It's peaceful.
Hey, @. Are you gonna enter the ice fishing competition?#$e#Oh, not me. I don't know how to fish.
Oh, ice. A beautiful material to sculpt in, but so impermanent.#$e#But I guess that might make the art even better.
I feel bad for all the poor, cold animals out there.$s
I'm entering the ice fishing competition today. Why not?#$e#It's rare that Willy ever loses, though.
Sorry there's no food.#$e#Just wait until the Feast of the Winter Star. You'll be stuffed for days.

$y 'Hey, @. Ready for some ice fishing?_Yes. I'll do my best!_That's the spirit!$h_Yes, and I'm going to beat you!_We'll see.$h_To be honest, no. I'm bad at fishing._Well, then think of it as good practice!$h'
Sneaking off to visit my weird tower? You're odd for a mundane.
Extreme temperatures can put your body under a lot of stress, so make sure to bundle up!#$e#Oh, and enjoy the festival!$h
I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
I wanna give him a carrot nose!$h
I saw a big fish down there!
Hey, good afternoon.
You could make an igloo twice as warm if you stuffed feathers in the walls!
